# NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.ready

**Case**

The protocol is immediately ready to send and receive data.

## Declaration

```swift
case ready
```

## Start Results

- **NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.willMarkReady**: The protocol will perform a handshake, preventing the overall connection from becoming ready until [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/NWProtocolFramer/Instance/markReady()] is called.
